title: Sailor beware = Panic in the parlour
creator_credit: Gordon Parry, Jack Clayton, Romulus Films and British Lion Films
brief_description: From the stage play “Sailor beware” by Philip King and Falkland L. Cary with an introduction by Bill Collins. A humorous tale of domestic conflict between Shirley (Shirley Eaton), her prospective sailor husband-to-be Albert (Ronald Lewis) and Shirley’s overbearing acerbic tongued mother, Emma (Peggy Mount). Cast includes Cyril Smith, Esme Cannon, Gordon jackson, Geoffrey Keen, Joy Webster, Thora Hird.
